TopicTitle: I downloaded ksp but it is stuck on a black screen, why is this???

Articles.Content: I downloaded ksp but it isn't working, I was stuck on a black screen, I'd like to know why, is it because my computer isn't fast enough or is it something else, also, the ksp music thingy is still playing. please reply

How long does it sit? Sometimes my copies load slowly. Got any mods installed? 

Also, thread moved to Support.

So, have you downloaded and played KSP on this computer before or this is the first time?

What are the specs of your computer? Or rather, does it meet the games minimum requirements?

You can hear music but just a black screen? Have you tried Alt-tabbing back and forth?
Make sure your graphic drivers are up to date. Also try running as administrator.
guys I checked my computer specs and I figured my video card drive needed an update so I updated it and no it works, thanks guys!
